description: Presents 16 vignettes showing children in a variety of unsafe predicaments, ranging from everyday personal safety situations through to harassment and abuse situations. Each vignette has been designed for use as a single scenario to present to students as part of the problem-solving process and includes students from a variety of cultural and socio-economic backgrounds, from preschool to high school age and with gender as a factor of analysis. Includes support booklet for teacher use. Suitable for primary and secondary levels.
